languages.text: "Природа Януса восстала? Очень удачно, что на планете есть большие специалисты не только по контролю, но и по истреблению жизни. Хотя в докладах из капеллы Магос Биологис нет ни слова о хранении оружия массового поражения, не сомневаюсь, что оно у них имеется. Оно всегда у них имеется. Пусть применят его против этой дряни".

"The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella make no mention of storing weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always do. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."
languages.original_text: "Природа Януса восстала? Очень удачно, что на планете есть большие специалисты не только по контролю, но и по истреблению жизни. Хотя в докладах из капеллы Магос Биологис нет ни слова о хранении оружия массового поражения, не сомневаюсь, что оно у них имеется. Оно всегда у них имеется. Пусть применят его против этой дряни".

traits.locale_text: "The nature of Janus is revolting? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus has not just the specialists on controlling life, but on destroying it as well.Even though the reports from the Magos Biologis Capella have no mention of the storage of the weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some. So they should use against this tripe."

It is a lucky coincidence that Janus has not just the specialists on controlling life, but on destroying it as well.Even though the reports from the Magos Biologis Capella have no mention of the storage of the weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some. So they should use against this tripe."

"The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

"The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella make no mention of storing weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always do. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

languages.text: “加努斯的本性要显现出来了吗？不过幸好，驻扎在加努斯的专家不仅擅长控制生命，也同样擅长毁灭生命。尽管生物贤者的报告没有提到大规模杀伤性武器的存在，但我坚信他们确实拥有这样的武器，他们身边总会有这样的玩意儿。虽然不知道这个问题到底是怎么回事，但我认为没有理由不动用这样的武器。”
languages.original_text: "The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: “加努斯的本性要显现出来了吗？不过幸好，驻扎在加努斯的专家不仅擅长控制生命，也同样擅长毁灭生命。尽管生物贤者的报告没有提到大规模杀伤性武器的存在，但我坚信他们确实拥有这样的武器，他们身边总会有这样的玩意儿。虽然不知道这个问题到底是怎么回事，但我认为没有理由不动用这样的武器。”

languages.text: «¿La naturaleza de Janus se está rebelando? Es una afortunada coincidencia que Janus albergue especialistas que no solo son expertos en controlar la vida, sino también en destruirla. Aunque los informes de la Magos Biologis Capella no mencionan el almacenamiento de armas de destrucción masiva, no me cabe duda de que poseen algunas. Siempre tienen alguna por ahí. No veo razón para prohibir que las usen contra esto, sea lo que sea».
languages.original_text: "The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: «¿La naturaleza de Janus se está rebelando? Es una afortunada coincidencia que Janus albergue especialistas que no solo son expertos en controlar la vida, sino también en destruirla. Aunque los informes de la Magos Biologis Capella no mencionan el almacenamiento de armas de destrucción masiva, no me cabe duda de que poseen algunas. Siempre tienen alguna por ahí. No veo razón para prohibir que las usen contra esto, sea lo que sea».

languages.text: 「ヤヌスの本質が沸き上がっているのか？生命をコントロールするだけでなく、破壊する専門家をヤヌスが抱えているとは、偶然の幸運とも言えよう。生物学賢人カペラの報告書には、大量破壊兵器の保管については言及されていなかったが、彼らが何らかの兵器を保有していてもおかしくない。それらはいつもその辺に転がっている。それがどのような兵器であれ、今回使わせる可能性はあると思う」
languages.original_text: "The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: 「ヤヌスの本質が沸き上がっているのか？生命をコントロールするだけでなく、破壊する専門家をヤヌスが抱えているとは、偶然の幸運とも言えよう。生物学賢人カペラの報告書には、大量破壊兵器の保管については言及されていなかったが、彼らが何らかの兵器を保有していてもおかしくない。それらはいつもその辺に転がっている。それがどのような兵器であれ、今回使わせる可能性はあると思う」

languages.text: « La nature de Janus se rebelle ? Quelle heureuse coïncidence : la planète abrite des spécialistes qui sont non seulement versés dans l'art de contrôler la vie, mais aussi de la détruire. Même si les rapports du Magos Biologis Capella ne mentionnent aucune réserve d'armes de destruction massive, je ne doute pas une seule seconde qu'ils en possèdent bel et bien. Ils parviennent toujours à en mettre quelques-unes de côté. Je ne vois aucune raison de les empêcher de s'en servir contre cette menace indéterminée. »
languages.original_text: "The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: « La nature de Janus se rebelle ? Quelle heureuse coïncidence : la planète abrite des spécialistes qui sont non seulement versés dans l'art de contrôler la vie, mais aussi de la détruire. Même si les rapports du Magos Biologis Capella ne mentionnent aucune réserve d'armes de destruction massive, je ne doute pas une seule seconde qu'ils en possèdent bel et bien. Ils parviennent toujours à en mettre quelques-unes de côté. Je ne vois aucune raison de les empêcher de s'en servir contre cette menace indéterminée. »

languages.text: "Die Natur auf Janus erhebt sich? Glücklicherweise beherbergt Janus Spezialisten, die nicht nur Experten darin sind, das Leben zu kontrollieren, sondern auch darin, es zu zerstören. Auch wenn in Berichten der Magos Biologis Capella keine Massenvernichtungswaffen erwähnt werden, bin ich überzeugt, dass sie solche Waffen besitzen. Irgendwo haben sie immer welche herumliegen. Ich sehe keinen Grund, sie nicht gegen dieses ... Ding einzusetzen."
languages.original_text: "The nature of Janus is rising up? It is a lucky coincidence that Janus harbours specialists who are not only experts on controlling life, but on destroying it as well. Even though reports from the Magos Biologis Capella bare no mention of the storage of weapons of mass destruction, I have no doubt that they do possess some. They always have some lying around. I see no reason not to let them use them against this, whatever it is."
